name: Worker's Compensation
description:
Weekly Game Jam 130 Entry - "Death is Awarded"

Billy is a hard working salary man who has been recently promoted! But little did he know he would be awarded death by tentacle monsters!

As Billy dies, he becomes "promoted".

Art: Jordan Potenza -https://jordanspixels.itch.io/ @jordanspixels

Music: Gregg Rossetti  - https://gregg-rossetti.itch.io/  www.greggrossetti.com  @greggrossetti

Programming: Eduardo Dominguez - https://knewaccount.itch.io  @knewaccount1
